bgDescription:
This dish features meat stir-fried with a generous amount of Pavo Plums. It's flavorful yet not greasy, aromatic, and spicy. It's an essential, simple dish to help you get through a lengthy winter.
"Want it tasty? Just add more Pavo Plums. It has to be spicy! The spiciness is key to its flavor!"
description: Increases Energy Regen of all Resonators on the team by 20%, lasting for 30m. Only effective for your own Resonators in Co-Op Mode.
obtainDescription: Increases Energy Regen of all Resonators on the team by 20%, lasting for 30m. Only effective for your own Resonators in Co-Op Mode.
